cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump proclaims that he will find a way to implement national voter-ID requirements by November's elections.

cnbc.summary: A series of setbacks for the White House is drawing focus even as Trump touts a drug-pricing initiative, stock market gains, lower inflation as political wins.

cnbc.title: Dubai's DP World replaces CEO after Epstein links emerge
cnbc.summary: Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem had been the CEO of Dubai's largest port operator since 2016 and chairman since 2007.
